You conjure a magical gamtu hat, which is a magic item of light Bulk. The gamtu persists for 1 hour, and you can give the gamtu to another creature to wear.

Effect You tap the hat and gain the effects of a 2nd-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Invisibility] spell, which lasts for the spell's normal duration, until the hat is removed, or until the hat's normal duration runs out, whichever comes first. After the spell ends, the gamtu disappears.
